base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray cabinet with modern style.
part_description: Includes one large door, one drawer above, with handles; rectangular shape; door and drawer vertically aligned.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides horizontally above the main door, providing access to a separate compartment. The main door swings open vertically, revealing the interior space. Both parts use handles for operation, ensuring smooth and easy access to stored items.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against walls or between other furniture, providing storage space. It interacts with users through its handles, allowing them to open the drawer and door for storing or retrieving items. Its modern design complements various room decors.
